catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 72
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: small sheets of paper (shishiki) decorated with calligraphy or illustrated scenes from Genji dispersed over panels of gold foil; 108 total; calligraphy is written by various courtiers whose names are inscribed on small slips of paper next to the shishiki
medium: Twenty-seven shikishi of painting (ink and color on paper) and twenty-seven shikishi of text (ink on paper), pasted on gilded paper
object_name: Six-panel folding screen, one of a pair (left)
title: Fifty-four Scenes from the Tale of Genji
